Image_Gallery

Weiyue Liu1, Zhongyi Hua2, Tong Zhou3

Last compiled on 06 May, 2023

Image_Gallery.Rmd

Introduction

In order to demonstrate how to use multiple functions from itol.toolkit comprehensively, we have selected some published diagrams created by iTOL to reproduce. The data necessary for reproduction includes tree files in newick format and metadata for annotation. If metadata is not available, metadata can be generated from template files shared by authors.

This section lists the images we reproduced, and users can view the corresponding detailed reproduction steps through the links above the images.

Li et al. 2022 JHazardMater

Reproduce_Li_2022_JHazardMater

Fig.2 of Li et al. 2022

Zheng et al. 2022 EnvironPollut

Reproduce_Zheng_2022_EnvironPollut

Fig.3 of Zheng et al. 2022

Fig.4 of Zheng et al. 2022
